title: Why are panhandlers allowed to walk up and down the medians and annoy drivers at College Rd and Oleander Dr? I thought panhandling was outlawed in the city of Wilmington a few years back.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/panhandlers-allowed-walk-medians-college-road-oleander-drive/
